item.description:
THE 2nd NORTHEAST REGIONAL REPUBLIC CONFERENCE
All Northeast Republic Assemblies and Friends are invited:
Saturday, April 9, 2011
Meriden Masonic Temple, 112 East Main Street, Meriden, Connecticut
06450-5604
Telephone: (203) 634-9887
_____________________________________________________________________________________________________________________
Suggested Donation: $10 at the door
_____________________________________________________________________________________________________________________
PLEASE RSVP (with guest information, if applicable) TO: Chris Salonia via email:

c.salonia@republicoftheunitedstates.org or phone: 203-235-4864 by March 30th!!

About Bill: Bill is a former newspaper editor and publisher, best-selling author and award-warding documentary writer/director. He has written for USA Today, The Saturday Evening Post, the Los Angeles Times Syndicate, OMNI magazine, and produced the syndicated radio program, Health News. He has written 20 books, including his latest, No More National Debt, due out in March 2011; and three feature-length documentaries, including The Money Masters (1995), the 15th-most-watched film on the Internet in history; and The Secret of Oz (2010), winner and Best Documentary of 2010 at the Beloit International Film Festival. His film The Money Masters is the third most viewed video on the internet.

To view the full length video “Secret of Oz” go: http://tinyurl.com/secret-of-oz999


~~BILL STILL~~
World Famous Author, Producer and Director
Featured Guest on the Alex Jones INFOWARS Show!

AGENDA
Regional Meeting: Meet & Greet: 9:00-9:30 a.m.
Assembly Meeting: 9:30 - 10:30 a.m.
Guest Speaker: 10:30 a.m. – 12:30 p.m.
LUNCH 12:30 – 1:30 p.m.
Guest Speaker 1:30 p.m. – 5:30 p.m. (time includes question and answer period)
Bill will be bringing books and DVDs with him. We will have a question and
answer session after the presentation.
item.name: 2nd Northeast Region Republic Conference
